name: Ballista
description: A large crossbow-like siege weapon that fires heavy bolts. It takes three actions to load, aim, and fire the Ballista: Load (action), Aim (action), Fire (action).

actionsToOperate.description: One creature uses its action to load the Ballista.
One creature uses its action to aim the Ballista.
One creature uses its action to fire the Ballista.
